story.title: As a User I want the total Like-to-time coefficient to be maximum for the dishes.

scenario.title: 1 - I want to be able remove some dishes, in which case, a new coefficient is calculated using the left dishes.
scenario.step: Given a collection of dishes with the following values 1, 3, 5, 6, 8

scenario.title: 2 - The solution must calculate the maximum sum of all possible Like-to-time coefficients.
scenario.step: Given a collection of dishes with the following values 2, 3, 4
When i calculate the maximum sum of coefficients
